model: SMART Board MX (V5) 55” Interactive Display with iQ
features: HyPr Touch with Advanced IR
Object Awareness and Simultaneous Tool Differentiation
Integrated iQ Android 13 OS with OTA updates
Built-in speakers and microphone array
Proximity, ambient light, and IR sensors
Supports NFC sign-in and device-based SMART Account login
Split screen and Picture-in-Picture with touch passthrough
Supports SMART Notebook, Lumio, and SMART Ink
Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.2
Google Play Store and cloud storage access
